channel.title: Redhat on Nathan Curry
channel.description: Recent content in Redhat on Nathan Curry

item.title: Red Hat EX200 Recap
item.description: I’m an RHCSA as of August 17th, and I figured I’d jot down a few notes about my preparation, successes, and failures. Preparation My materials to prepare for this exam: CBT Nuggets System Administrator Prep videos Michael Jang’s RCHSA/RHCE 7 book Some free online practice exams 3x micro PCs for hypervisors The CBT Nuggets video series was rudimentary, but it has one of the better intros into SELinux that I’ve seen.
